MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of living organisms?
Choices: a: Growth | b: Reproduction | c: Metabolism | d: Decay

MCQ: What is the basic unit of life?
Choices: a: Atom | b: Molecule | c: Cell | d: Tissue

MCQ: Which process allows plants to make their own food?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Digestion | d: Fermentation

MCQ: Which organ is responsible for pumping blood throughout the body?
Choices: a: Heart | b: Lungs | c: Liver | d: Brain

MCQ: What is the function of DNA in living organisms?
Choices: a: Energy storage | b: Genetic information storage | c: Protein synthesis | d: Waste elimination
